name: imjs
description: Client library for communication with InterMine web-services

scripts.build-for-browser: coffee -c -o lib src/*.coffee; cat lib/shiv.js lib/model.js lib/service.js lib/query.js lib/lists.js > build/im.js
scripts.test: C=0; T=0; for t in test/node/*.coffee; do T=$(($T + 1)); echo running $t; expresso $t && C=$(($C + 1)) && echo ok; done; test $C = $T && echo aok || echo tests failed
